<a id="class_VisualShaderNodeTexture2DArrayParameter"></a>

# VisualShaderNodeTexture2DArrayParameter

**Inherits:** [VisualShaderNodeTextureParameter](class_visualshadernodetextureparameter.md) **<** [VisualShaderNodeParameter](class_visualshadernodeparameter.md) **<** [VisualShaderNode](class_visualshadernode.md) **<** [Resource](class_resource.md) **<** [RefCounted](class_refcounted.md) **<** [Object](class_object.md)

A visual shader node for shader parameter (uniform) of type [Texture2DArray](class_texture2darray.md).

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

This parameter allows to provide a collection of textures for the shader. You can use [VisualShaderNodeTexture2DArray](class_visualshadernodetexture2darray.md) to extract the textures from array.
